parameters.name: capabilities
parameters.description: The worker capabilities to update. The worker capabilities amounts on a list of worker capabilities. (dict) --- The details of the worker amount capability. The name of the worker amount capability. The value of the worker amount capability. The worker attribute capabilities in the list of attribute capabilities. (dict) --- The details of the worker attribute capability. The name of the worker attribute capability. The values of the worker amount capability. (string) ---

parameters.name: hostProperties
parameters.description: The host properties to update. ipAddresses (dict) --- The IP address of the host. ipV4Addresses (list) --- The IpV4 address of the network. (string) --- ipV6Addresses (list) --- The IpV6 address for the network and node component. (string) --- hostName (string) --- The host name.
